title: Jurassic Park
tip: Dinosaurs run wild in a theme park.
fact: Released in 1993, it was one of the first films to use realistic CGI dinosaurs.

title: Back to the Future
fact: The film was directed by Robert Zemeckis and produced by Steven Spielberg.

title: Forrest Gump
tip: Life is like a box of chocolates.
fact: Tom Hanks won an Oscar for his role in this 1994 classic.

title: The Matrix
tip: Choose the red pill or the blue pill.
fact: It revolutionised action scenes with its 'bullet time' effects.

title: The Dark Knight
tip: Batman faces off against the Joker.
fact: Heath Ledger won a posthumous Oscar for his role as the Joker.

title: Indiana Jones
fact: Harrison Ford starred in the role beginning in 1981.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean
fact: The franchise is based on a Disney theme park ride.

title: Mission Impossible
fact: Tom Cruise performed many of his own stunts in the series.

title: Gladiator
tip: A Roman general becomes a fighter.
fact: It won Best Picture at the 2001 Academy Awards.

title: The Hunger Games
tip: Teens fight for survival in a dystopia.
fact: Jennifer Lawrence played Katniss Everdeen in the film series.
